name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior QA Engineer with expertise in **TypeScript**, **Cucumber-JS**, **Playwright**, and **Appium** for robust test automation and quality assurance. Adept at implementing CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, ensuring timely delivery and continuous integration. Skilled in testing RESTful APIs with tools like **node-fetch**, **Axios**, **Supertest**, and **Postman**, alongside experience in managing testing workflows using **Testmo** and **TestRail**. Proven track record in the iGaming sector, including exposure to **blockchain** and **Web3** technologies. Previously recognized as an experienced Full-Stack Software Engineer, proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot** for backend, and **React**, **Vue**, **Angular** for dynamic frontend solutions, delivering scalable and user-centric applications across healthcare, eCommerce, and finance industries, all while adhering to best practices in clean and efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented automated testing frameworks using **TypeScript**, **Cucumber-JS**, and **Playwright**, enhancing test coverage by **75%** for web applications.
Conducted API testing for **RESTful APIs** with **Supertest** and **Postman**, improving detection of flaws by **60%**, ensuring high standards in application performance and reliability.
Leveraged **node-fetch** and **Axios** for API testing integration which streamlined communication between services, reducing data transfer time by **50%**.
Employed **Appium** and **Maestro** for mobile app testing, which increased the frequency of successful regressions by **80%** and minimized critical bugs in production.
Developed CI/CD pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, automating the testing process and decreasing deployment time by **80%**.
Collaborated with development teams to integrate testing into the development lifecycle using **Testmo** and **TestRail**, improving overall test management efficiency by **40%**.
Conducted exploratory and regression testing across various devices with **BrowserStack**, achieving a **95%** pass rate in cross-device compatibility tests.
Assisted in the transition to **blockchain** and **Web3** technologies within iGaming applications, ensuring quality assurance in rapidly evolving tech environments.

Designed and implemented robust automated testing frameworks using **TypeScript**, **Cucumber-JS**, and **Playwright** for efficient quality assurance processes.
Developed comprehensive test scenarios leveraging **Appium** for mobile applications, ensuring high-quality user experiences across platforms.
Managed CI/CD pipelines integrated with **GitHub Actions**, streamlining the deployment process and reducing release times by 30%.
Utilized **RESTful APIs** testing tools including **Postman** and **Supertest** to validate API performance and reliability, achieving a 95% success rate in API validations.
Conducted thorough testing in **iGaming** environments while incorporating features of **blockchain** and **Web3**, enhancing product credibility and user engagement.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to establish a bug tracking system with **TestRail** and **Testmo**, significantly improving defect resolution workflows by 40%.
Enforced quality metrics and reporting processes using **BrowserStack** for cross-browser compatibility tests, ensuring seamless user experiences across different devices.

Implemented CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** to streamline deployment processes, achieving a 50% reduction in release time.
Developed and executed automated testing scripts using **Cucumber-JS** and **Playwright**, ensuring **90%** test coverage and increasing efficiency in regression testing.
Conducted API testing and validation of **RESTful APIs** using tools like **Postman** and **Supertest**, ensuring optimal functionality and performance.
Collaborated with development teams to integrate testing frameworks like **Appium** and **Testmo**, enhancing the overall quality of the applications and reducing bug occurrences by **20%**.
Engaged in continuous integration and delivery practices, leveraging tools such as **TestRail** and **BrowserStack** to improve cross-browser compatibility and user experience.
Utilized scripting and test automation strategies to support the development of iGaming and blockchain applications, incorporating frameworks like **Web3** for innovative solutions.
